name: Santa Bells - Frosty Xmas Snowflake
description:
+++MERRY CHRISTMAS!!+++

” Visually entertaining”
”High Definition graphics”
”Exciting Levels”
___________________________________

With different exciting levels of thrill, Santa Bells is an amusing pastime for all. Have fun to make the best, precise shot with the rings and earn the maximum points. Pumped up music and fun effects will make your child smile and discover a whole new world of entertainment.

Santa Bells is a Play-for-Fun game that is especially made for ultimate fun! Show the world your passionate gaming skills in this exciting Santa Bells game. Amazing sound effects, interactive gaming, achievements, audio and more!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Visually entertaining with Great graphics!
Pumped up sound track
Highly Addictive Gameplay
